title: Invisible Weave Part - Hollywood 100% Human Remy Hair Closure (1-JET BLACK)
description:
HOLLYWOOD Remy Invisible Weave


Washing and Care Instruction
1. Wash in cool or lukewarm water.
2. Use shampoo and brush gently.
3. Follow with conditioner and rinse thoroughly.  Apply cream rinse or wet-look spray as desired.
4. Pat dry and while using a wide-tooth comb, apply spray throughout.
5. Set and dry naturally.
6. Comb into desired style after hair is completely dry.

title: Straight Arrow Mane 'N Tail Herbal Gro Maximum 5.5oz
description: Maximum Herbal Gro is an advanced herbal styling and conditioning solution.Herbal Gro utilizes the natural power of herbs in an exclusively prepared formula to transform dull,lifeless hair and dry scalp into beautiful hair and a healthy conditioned scalp.
